title: Regulators close New York's Signature Bank, citing systemic risk
description: U.S. regulators on Sunday shut down New York-based Signature Bank in a bid to prevent the spreading banking crisis.

title: SVB's tech failings were a problem long before the bank run that led to its demise, critics say
description: A former Silicon Valley Bank employee and some SVB clients say the firm's inadequate technology created problems long before the run on the bank.

title: Regulators unveil plan to assure depositors will get money after SVB collapse
description: Banking regulators devised a plan Sunday to shore up deposits at Silicon Valley Bank, a critical step in stemming a feared panic.

title: Auction process is reportedly underway to find a buyer for Silicon Valley Bank
description: Federal regulators are exploring selling Silicon Valley Bank to another financial institution after the tech-focused bank was taken over on Friday.

title: Here's what could happen next for Silicon Valley Bank customers
description: Regulators are exploring ways to restore the uninsured deposits after the U.S. suffered its largest bank failure since 2008.

title: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen says U.S. government won't bail out Silicon Valley Bank
description: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen says U.S. government will not bail out Silicon Valley Bank

title: From Apple to Boeing, India is being put to the test as China manufacturing alternative
description: Boeing's big deal with Air India is a sign of significant efforts to move key commercial and defense manufacturing to India as its role grows relative to China.

title: Eliminate these 11 phrases that 'make people question your credibility,' says public speaking expert
description: Even the most successful people struggle to speak clearly, says Christina Helena, a public speaking coach who has worked with leaders at Google, Facebook and LinkedIn. She shares the words and phrases to ditch if you want more respect at work.

title: Guinness World Record holder and author of 'Brainhacker': This is the key to boosting your memory
description: Dave Farrow, a Guinness Record holder for his great memory, recalled the order of 59 decks of shuffled cards. Here's how he keeps his focus strong.

title: Hundreds of venture capital firms vow to work with Silicon Valley Bank again if new owner is found
Saudi oil giant Aramco posts record $161.1 billion profit for 2022
description: Saudi state-controlled Aramco achieved a record profit last year, boosted by higher energy prices and firmer sale volumes.
